= Multi-Hop Experiments =

Node is soekris net-4801 box.

Topology

Laptop1 <-> Node1 <-> Node2 <-> Node3 <-> Node4

Iperf sender on laptop1 and receiver on soekris box.

{{{

I found if there are nodes who can't be heard by other nodes, the performance drop a lot. I think the reason is the carrier sensing doesn't work in this case.
